project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a script that generates a random password containing uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. The user should be able to specify the length of the password.

task.name: Implement user input for password length
Implement functionality for including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters in the password
Write tests for the password generation functionality
Execute tests to ensure password generation works as expected
